sentence.Network_en: America's media companies bestride the globe.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国的传媒公司称雄寰球。

sentence.Network_en: You face him, bestride on his body one's knees.
sentence.Network_cn: 你面向他, 跨坐在他身上,屈膝.

sentence.Network_en: A lover may bestride the gossamer idles in the wanton summer air, and yet not fall.
sentence.Network_cn: 恋爱中人可以踩在夏空中迎风飘荡的蛛丝上, 而不致摔落.

entry.def: To bestride something means to be the most powerful and important person or thing in it.

example.ex: America's media companies bestride the globe.
example.tran: 美国的传媒公司称雄寰球。

auth_sentence.content: My ideas will bestride the world like a colossus.
auth_sentence.res_content: My ideas will bestride the world like a colossus.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My ideas will bestride the world like a colossus.

auth_sentence.content: Sisters, hence with spurs of speed,...Each bestride her sable steed.

auth_sentence.content: He has been the global star to bestride these Olympics and Mo Farah the domestic demigod.
